title: Story: Gate Command Enhancements
description:
Enhance gate commands with better error messages, smart detection, history tracking, and improved UX.

## Goal
Make gate system more intuitive and informative for both humans and agents.

## Tasks
- Enhance gate error messages with excerpts and suggestions
- Add gate modification flags to issue update command
- Implement smart 'jit gate pass' with auto-detection
- Add gate history command for auditing

## Success Criteria
- Gate errors show relevant output excerpts and suggest fixes
- Can modify gates via issue update (--add-gate/--remove-gate)
- 'jit gate pass' auto-detects automated vs manual gates
- Gate history shows all runs with filtering

## Benefits
- Reduced trial-and-error for gate usage
- Consistent command patterns (like labels)
- Better audit trail for quality gates
- Improved agent understanding of gate failures
